verses.verse: Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> reigneth <S%H4427><s%>; Let the earth <S%H776><s%> rejoice <S%H1523><s%>; Let the multitude <S%H7227><s%> of isles <S%H339><s%> be glad <S%H8055><s%>.
Clouds <S%H6051><s%> and darkness <S%H6205><s%> are round about <S%H5439><s%> him <S%H6664><s%>: Righteousness and justice <S%H4941><s%> are the foundation <S%H4349><s%> of his throne <S%H3678><s%>.
A fire <S%H784><s%> goeth <S%H3212><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him <S%H3857><s%>, And burneth up his adversaries <S%H6862><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.
His lightnings <S%H1300><s%> lightened <S%H215><s%> the world <S%H8398><s%>: The earth <S%H776><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%>, and trembled <S%H2342><s%>.

The mountains <S%H2022><s%> melted <S%H4549><s%> like wax <S%H1749><s%> at the presence <S%H6440><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, At the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of the whole earth <S%H776><s%>.
The heavens <S%H8064><s%> declare <S%H5046><s%> his righteousness <S%H6664><s%>, And all the peoples <S%H5971><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%> his glory <S%H3519><s%>.

Let all them be put to shame <S%H954><s%> that serve <S%H5647><s%> graven images <S%H6459><s%>, That boast <S%H1984><s%> themselves of idols <S%H457><s%>: Worship <S%H7812><s%> him <S%H430><s%>, all ye gods.

Zion <S%H6726><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> and was glad <S%H8055><s%>, And the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> rejoiced <S%H1523><s%>, Because of thy judgments <S%H4941><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
For thou <S%H3068><s%>, Jehovah, art most high above <S%H5945><s%> all the earth <S%H776><s%>: Thou art exalted <S%H5927><s%> far above <S%H3966><s%> all gods <S%H430><s%>.

O ye that love <S%H157><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, hate <S%H8130><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%>: He preserveth <S%H8104><s%> the souls <S%H5315><s%> of his saints <S%H2623><s%>; He delivereth <S%H5337><s%> them out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>.
Light <S%H216><s%> is sown <S%H2232><s%> for the righteous <S%H6662><s%>, And gladness <S%H8057><s%> for the upright <S%H3477><s%> in heart <S%H3820><s%>.
Be glad <S%H8055><s%> in Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, ye righteous <S%H6662><s%>; And give thanks <S%H3034><s%> to his holy <S%H6944><s%> memorial name <S%H2143><s%>.
